name: Nature's Blessing
description: A natural event, such as a bloom of rare wildflowers in a previously empty field, a glorious omen in the night sky like the northern lights, or the return to prominence of a previously rare type of wildlife raises your kingdom’s morale and inspires its creators.

criticalSuccess.msg: The glow of the blessing brings lasting delight. During your next turn, the results of checks to Craft Luxuries or Create a Masterpiece are improved one degree. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1d4">Lose 1d4 Unrest</button>

modifiers.name: Nature's Blessing: Critical Success
modifiers.buttonLabel: Increase Results of Craft Luxuries and Create a Masterpiece by One Degree

success.msg: Your blessing touches the hearts of all. You gain a +1 status bonus to Culture- and Stability-based checks on your next Kingdom turn.

failure.msg: The blessing inspires some of your people but not all of them.

criticalFailure.msg: Arguments over the meaning of the blessing taint people’s goodwill. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Unrest</button>
